title: Shore excursion receipts and tour booking confirmations
dataVerified: Passenger name, excursion details, tour operator, date, price, booking reference
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Booking status (confirmed/completed/cancelled). Link to tour operator/cruise system (passenger only, requires authentication)
rationale: Prevents fake shore excursion receipts. Domain binding verifies tour operator/cruise line. Expense claim verification. Cancellation refund documentation. Liability evidence.
